reviewText: Provides a biblical truth through the use of dramatic scenes, humor, and powerful music. Bishop George Bloomer and his talented cast spotlight what it means to challenge principalities and the powers of darkness without godly authority.  On this eye opening DVD watch how the spirit of oppression confronts and attacks during the quietness of the night and what happens when the Word of God isn't in your heart.  Examine the invisible world from a dramatic and scriptural perspective, then learn how to tear own the strongholds of the enemy and bring defeat to the forces of hell.  Your battle is already won, and your victory is on the way.
